availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Stiff Moore in Meade County, Kentucky, on January 31, 1854. Father of Ann P. Moore and Julia E. Moore. Laborer in Bullitt County in 1850. Laborer in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 171A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District 1, p. 21.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Meade County Marriages, Film #000390322.
